tuv.seg: *dlkmo*：模型需要优化大约 5 分钟 ，适用于训练模型与部署模型使用的设备 GPU 显卡型号不同的情况。
*dlkmo*: The model optimization takes about 5 minutes. This model type is for the situation where the GPU graphics card models are different for model training and model deployment.
*dlkmt*：模型无需优化可以直接导出使用，仅支持训练模型与部署模型使用的设备 GPU 显卡型号相同的情况。
*dlkmt*: No optimization is required for this type. This model type is for the situation where the GPU graphics card models are the same for model training and model deployment.
*启动项目*：点击 btn:[启动] 运行程序。
*Start the project*: Click btn:[Start] to run the program.
*引用 SDK*：点击右键工程栏中的 btn:[引用] 选择添加引用，会弹出引用管理器窗口，点击 浏览 勾选 run time 文件夹下的 mmind_dl_sdk_csharp.dll 文件后点击 btn:[确定] 。

*Reference SDK*: Right-click btn:[Reference] on the project column, select *Add Reference*. When the reference manager window pops up, click btn:[Browse…], check the file mmind_dl_sdk_csharp.dll in the folder run_time and click on btn:[OK].
*打开示例工程*：双击下图路径下的 SDK_Example.sln 文件，使用 Visual Studio 2019 应用打开。
*Open the example project*：Double-click the file _SDK_Example.sln_ in the path shown below to open it with Visual Studio 2019.
*添加运行时库*：将下图文件夹内所有的 dll 格式的文件拷贝到上一步骤生成的可执行文件 Release 目录下，若有重复文件，直接覆盖即可。

*Add the “run_time” library*: Copy all the dll format files in the folder below to the release directory of the executable file generated in the previous step. If there are duplicate files, just overwrite them.Original file location
*生成解决方案*：点击上方导航栏的 btn:[生成] 选择btn:[生成解决方案(B)] 生成可执行文件。在界面下方的输出栏中查看可执行文件生成的路径。
*Build a solution*: Click btn:[Build], select btn:[Build Solution] to generate the executable file. Check the path generated by the executable in the output section at the bottom of the interface.
1000为正常，其他值为异常，详情见 接口函数调用返回值
1000 means normal, other values mean errors. Please see Returned Values of Interface Function Call for details.
CPU 和 GPU 版本模型的训练及部署
CPU and GPU Model Training and Deployment
CPU 和 GPU 版本模型部署
CPU 版本模型训练与部署
Convertflag：实例分割掩膜绘制内外接矩形布尔值，默认为 false。
Convertflag: The Boolean flag for drawing the inscribed and circumscribed rectangles of the instance masks. The value defaults to false.
GPU 版本模型训练与部署
InferPackResult：推理结果。详情见 xref:inferpackresult[接口函数推理返回结果] 。
InferPackResult: Inference result. See xref:inferpackresult[Returned Results of Interface Function Inference] for details.

Project-Id-Version: Antora 1.0 POT-Creation-Date: 2023-03-21 20:24-0700 PO-Revision-Date: 2023-03-21 20:24-0700 Last-Translator: Automatically generated Language-Team: none Language: en MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8 Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit Plural-Forms: nplurals=2; plural=(n != 1);

Project-Id-Version: Antora 1.0 POT-Creation-Date: 2023-03-21 20:24-0700 PO-Revision-Date: 2023-03-21 20:24-0700 Last-Translator: Automatically generated Language-Team: none Language: en MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8 Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit Plural-Forms: nplurals=2; plural=(n != 1);
SDKStatus：1000为正常，其他值为异常，详情见 xref:sdkstatus[接口函数调用返回值] 。
SDKStatus: 1000 means normal, other values mean errors. Please see xref:sdkstatus[Returned Values of Interface Function Call] for details.
SDK_Example 工程提供了示例，展示如何使用 Mech-DLK SDK 来完成应用程序中所需的功能。此处以缺陷分割为例，并为用户提供了所需的模型和图像数据集，带领用户运行 SDK 工程：

The SDK_Example project provides examples showing how to use the Mech-DLK SDK to implement the required functions in the application. Taking defect segmentation as an example, this section provides the required model and image dataset to lead the user to run the SDK project:
bboxes：包围框坐标序列，4个一组（左上X、左上Y、右下X、右下Y）。 **confidenceNumber：置信度结果的数量。 **confidences：置信度结果。
bboxes: Bounding box coordinates. Each 4 values (upper left X, upper left Y, lower right X, lower right Y) are for one box.
btn:[Load Image]: Load the image to be inferred.
btn:[Load Model] ：加载 Mech-DLK 导出的 dlkpack 格式的模型。
btn:[Load Model]: Load a model in dlkpack format exported by {product-dlk}.
flag：可视化布尔量，默认为 false。
flag: The boolean flag for visualization. The value defaults to false.
h：实例分割的掩膜图像的高。
h: Mask image height for instance segmentation.
insegMask: Mask result for instance segmentation.
int：1000 为正常，其他值为异常，详情见 xref:function-call[接口函数调用返回值] 。
int: 1000 means no error occurred; other values mean errors. Please see xref:function-call[Returned Values of Interface Function Call] for details.
maskNumber: Number of instance segmentation masks.
segMask: Mask result for defect segmentation.
w：实例分割的掩膜图像的宽。
w: Mask image width for instance segmentation.
一般情况下建议使用 *标准* 模式
Generally, it is recommended to use Normal mode.
两个图像的位深度不一致
Inconsistent bit depths of two images.
两个图像的尺寸不一致
两个图像的类型不一致
使用模型进行推理前，使用设备显卡处理图像数据。建议使用 *GPU* 参数
For pre-processing image data before using the model for inference. Generally, it is recommended to select *GPU*.
包围框坐标序列，4个一组（左上X、左上Y、右下X、右下Y）
Bounding box coordinates. Every 4 values (upper left X, upper left Y, lower right X, lower right Y) are for one box.
参数值超出右限位。如参数值范围为[0.0, 1.0],当参数值大于1.0时产生
The parameter value exceeds the right limit. Example: If the parameter value range is [0.0, 1.0], it will be generated when the parameter value is greater than 1.0.
参数值超出左限位。如参数值范围为[0.0, 1.0],当参数值小于0.0时产生
The parameter value exceeds the left limit. Example: If the parameter value range is [0.0, 1.0], it will be generated when the parameter value is less than 0.0.
图像上下翻转 180°。若待检测物体存在上下对称的情况，可以开启 *垂直翻转* 。
Flips the image 180° upside down. If the objects to be recognized have vertical symmetry, you can turn on *Flip vertically*.
图像分类（需要开启深度学习服务器）
Image Classification (Please start the deep learning server for the Step.)
图像左右翻转 180°。若待识别物体存在左右对称的情况，可以开启 *水平翻转* 。
Flips the image 180° left to right. If the objects to be recognized have left-right symmetry, you can turn on *Flip horizontally*.
图像灰度反差的大小。目标物体和背景差异较小时，适当调整 *对比度* 范围，可以使目标物体特征更明显。

Contradiction in luminance or color. When the objects are not obviously distinct from the background, you can adjust the *contrast* to make the object features more obvious.
Translation
图像的明暗程度。现场光照变化较大时，可以通过调整 *亮度* 范围倍增不同光照状态下的图像数据集。
It refers to how much light is present in the image. When the on-site lighting changes greatly, by adjusting the *brightness* range, you can augment the data to have larger variations in brightness.
图像色彩空间变换的转换参数错误
Incorrect conversion parameters for image color space transformation.
在上一次训练的最优模型的基础上进行训练，可以减少训练时间。
Train based on the optimal model trained last time, which helps reduce the training time.
在现有超级模型的基础上进行微调，需要选择已有的超模，并加入模型预测效果不好的图像进行训练，可以减少训练时间。
Perform fine-tuning based on the existing Super Model. You need to select the existing Super Model and add images on which the model has poor performance for training, thus saving the training time.
如何提高模型推理速度和精度
Improve Model Inference Speed and Accuracy
如何提高模型训练速度和精度
Improve Model Training Speed and Accuracy
学习率决定神经网络训练过程中每一次迭代优化的步长。建议使用默认设定，图表损失曲线收敛较慢时，可以适当调大 *学习率* ；若图表精度波动较大，可以适当调小 *学习率* 。

The learning rate sets the step length for each iteration of optimization during neural network training. It is recommended to use the default setting. When the loss curve shows a slow convergence, you can appropriately increase the *learning rate*; if the accuracy fluctuates greatly, you can appropriately decrease the *learning rate.
实例分割最大内接矩形坐标序列，4个一组（左上X、左上Y、右下X、右下Y）
Instance max inscribed rectangle coordinates. Every 4 values (upper left X, upper left Y, lower right X, lower right Y) are for one rectangle.
实例分割最小外接矩形坐标序列，4个一组（左上X、左上Y、右下X、右下Y）
Instance min circumscribed rectangle coordinates. Every 4 values (upper left X, upper left Y, lower right X, lower right Y) are for one rectangle.
实例分割（需要开启深度学习服务器）
Instance Segmentation (Please start the deep learning server for the Step.)
将 *部署设备* 选择为 *CPU*。
将图像所有的像素坐标分别加上指定的水平偏移量和垂直偏移量。现场物体（料筐、托盘等）位置移动范围较大时，可以通过调整 *平移* 参数，随机倍增横向、纵向平移的数据集。

Add the specified horizontal and vertical offsets to all pixel coordinates of the image. When the positions of on-site objects (such as bins, pallets, etc.) move in a large range, by adjusting the *translation* range, you can augment the data in terms of object positions in images.
将图像按一定比例缩小或放大。物体摆放高度差异较大时，通过调整 *缩放* 参数 ，可以随机倍增不同缩放程度图像数据集。

Shrink or enlarge an image by a certain scale. When object distances from the camera vary greatly, by adjusting the *scale* range parameter, you can augment the data to have larger variations in object proportions in the images.
必须确保倍增的图像数据与现场实际情况一致。如果现场不会出现旋转的情况，那么不需要调整这一参数，否则可能会影响模型效果。

Please ensure that the added data reflects the actual on-site situations. For example, if there are no rotations on the site, then there is no need to adjust the parameter “Rotation”. Otherwise, the model’s performance may be affected.
指图像以某一点为中心旋转一定的角度，形成一张新的图像。一般情况下保持默认参数设定即可满足需求。物体摆放角度变化较大时，通过调整 *旋转* 参数，可以随机倍增多种角度的图像数据集。

Rotate an image by a certain angle around a certain point to form a new image. In general, keeping the default parameters can meet the requirements. When the object orientations vary greatly, by adjusting the *rotation* range, you can augment the image data to have larger variations in object orientations.
按一定比例扩大图像中标注的缺陷区域。只支持在“缺陷分割”模块使用，一般情况下不需要勾选，若图像标注的缺陷较小可以勾选 *标注膨胀* ，避免因图像缩放导致缺陷太小而影响训练的情况。

Enlarge the regions of defects selected in an image by a certain scale. Only supported in the Defect Segmentation module. For most scenarios, you do not need to check this option. If the regions of defects are too small, you can check this option to avoid affecting training when the defect regions are too small after image scaling.
标准（推荐 GPU 部署）
模型初始化时产生异常
模型推理一次所选取的样本数量。建议使用默认设定；在“缺陷分割”模块下，若图像尺寸太大缺陷区域较小时，适当调大 *批量大小* 参数可以加快推理速度，但会导致显存占用变高。

The number of samples taken at one time for model inference. It is recommended to use the default setting. For the Defect Segmentation module, if the image size is too large and the defect regions are small, appropriately increasing the *batch size* can speed up the inference, but will lead to higher memory usage.
模型效果不好或精度要求较高时可以选择 *增强* 模式，该模式会导致训练速度变慢
You can choose the *Enhanced* mode when the model effect is not as expected or the accuracy requirement is high. This mode will decrease the training speed.
模型无需优化可以直接导出使用，仅支持训练模型与部署模型使用的设备 GPU 显卡型号相同的情况
No optimization is required for this type. This model type is for the situation where the GPU graphics card models are the same for model training and model deployment.
模型类型，0为未知模型，1为缺陷分割，2为实例分割，3为目标检测，4为图像分类
Model type. 0: unknown model; 1: defect segmentation; 2: instance segmentation; 3: object detection; 4: image classification.
模型精度低，推理速度较快
Low model accuracy, high inference speed.
模型精度高，推理速度较慢
High model accuracy, low inference speed.
模型训练时，每评估一次间隔的轮次数量。建议使用默认设定，调大 *间隔轮次* 参数可以提升训练速度 ，参数值越大训练越快；参数值越小训练越慢，但有助于挑选最优模型。

The number of epochs for each evaluation interval during model training. It is recommended to use the default setting. Increasing the Eval. interval can increase the training speed. The larger the parameter, the faster the training; the smaller the parameter, the slower the training, but a smaller value helps select the optimal model.
模型训练的总轮次。建议使用默认设定，若待识别图像特征较复杂时，需要适当增加训练轮次，提升模型效果，但会导致训练时间变长。

The total number of epochs of model training. It is recommended to use the default setting. If the features of objects to be recognized are complex, it is necessary to increase the number of training epochs appropriately to improve the model performance, but increasing the number of epochs will lead to longer training time.
模型部署在 CPU 设备时选择此选项
Select this option when the model is deployed on a CPU device.
模型部署在 CPU 设备时，将 *部署设备* 选择为 *CPU*。
If the model is to be deployed on a CPU device, please select *CPU* for *Deployment device*.
模型部署在 CPU 设备时，训练参数中推荐将 *模型类型* 选择为 *轻量（推荐CPU部署）* 。
If the model is to be deployed on a CPU device, it is recommended to select *Lite (better with CPU deployment)*.
模型部署在 GPU 设备时选择此选项
Select this option when the model is deployed on a GPU device.
模型部署在 GPU 设备时，将 *部署设备* 选择为 *GPU*。
If the model is to be deployed on a GPU device, please select *GPU* for *Deployment device*.
模型部署在 GPU 设备时，训练参数中推荐将 *模型类型* 选择为 *标准（推荐GPU部署）* 。
If the model is to be deployed on a GPU device, it is recommended to select *Normal (better with GPU deployment)*.
模型需要优化大约 5 分钟 ，适用于训练模型与部署模型使用的设备 GPU 显卡型号不同的情况
The model optimization takes about 5 minutes. This model type is for the situation where the GPU graphics card models are different for model training and model deployment.
注册模型的个数超过限制错误
Number of registered models beyond the limit.
深度学习模型包CPU推理 深度学习模型包推理（{product-dlk}2.2.0+）
Deep Learning Model Package CPU Inference/ Deep Learning Inference ({product-dlk}2.2.0+)
用户训练设备的显卡信息。若用户的设备有多块 GPU ，可以在指定 GPU 进行训练。
Graphics card information of the model deployment device. If you have multiple GPU cards, you can select one for training.
用户部署设备的显卡信息。若用户的设备有多块 GPU ，可以在指定 GPU 上部署。
The graphics card information of the device deployed by the user. If the user’s device has multiple GPUs, the model deployment can be done on a specified GPU.
目标检测（需要开启深度学习服务器）
Object Detection (Please start the deep learning server for the Step.)
神经网络训练一次选取的样本数量。建议使用默认设定；若需要提高训练速度时，可以适当调大 *批量大小* 参数，参数设置太大会导致显存占用变高。

The number of samples selected for each time of neural network training. It is recommended to use the default settings; if you need to increase the training speed, you can appropriately increase the *batch size*. If the batch size is set too large, memory usage will increase.
缺陷检测（需要开启深度学习服务器）
Defect Detection (Please start the deep learning server for the Step.)
若图像较大需要提高图像预处理速度，可以选择 *CPU* 参数
If the images are large and image preprocessing should be fast, you can select *CPU*.
获取模型结果时产生异常
训练时输入神经网络的图像宽高（单位：像素）。建议使用默认设定；若图像中的物体或标注缺陷区域较小时，需要适当调大 *输入图像尺寸* 。图像尺寸越大，模型精度越高，但是训练速度越低。

The pixel-wise height and width of the image input to the neural network for training. It is recommended to use the default setting, but if the objects or defect regions in the images are small, you need to increase the *input image size*. The larger the image size, the higher the model accuracy, but the lower the training speed.
训练模型的数据集需要尽量包含实际可能出现的所有情况，若现场不具备相应的采集条件，可以针对缺失的情况在训练前调整 *数据增强* 参数，在原有数据的基础上丰富训练数据集。

The data set for training the model needs to contain as much as possible all situations that may actually occur. If the site does not have the corresponding data-collecting conditions, you can adjust the *Data Enhancement* parameters to prepare data that can not be collected, thus enriching the training data set.
训练轮次并非越大越好，总轮次设置较大时，模型准确率稳定后还会持续训练，会导致训练时间变长，且有过拟合的风险。

It is not true that the bigger the number of epochs, the better. When the total number of epochs is set to be large, the model will continue to be trained after the accuracy stabilizes, which will result in a longer training time and the risk of overfitting.
设置对实例分割结果进行处理。若配置为 true, 实例分割类型的推理结果将会有内外接矩形信息，结果在 xref:inferpackresult[接口函数推理返回结果] 中，若性能要求较高请勿勾选。

Description: Set the processing of instance segmentation results. If true is input, the inference result of instance segmentation models will have information of the inscribed rectangles and the circumscribed rectangles, and the result will be in xref:inferpackresult[Returned Results of Interface Function Inference]. If you have high requirements on performance, please do not set it to true.
该选项用于简化神经网络结构。默认不勾选。训练数据集相对简单时，勾选该选项可以提高训练和推理速度。

This option is used to simplify the neural network structure. It is not checked by default. When the training data set is relatively simple, checking the option can improve the training and inference speeds.
说明：加载 Mech-DLK 导出的模型，该接口为同步接口，会阻塞，建议使用线程调用。
Descriotion: Load the model exported by {product-dlk}. This interface is a synchronous interface and may be blocked. It is recommended to use thread calls.
说明：推理引擎执行推理。
Description: Let the inference engine perform inference.
说明：解析 dlkpack 文件并创建对应的推理引擎。
Description: Parse the dlkpack file and create the corresponding inference engine.
说明：设置结果可视化。若配置为 true ，SDK 会自动将预测的结果与输入数据进行融合，结果在 xref:inferpackresult[接口函数推理返回结果] 中，若性能要求较高请勿勾选。

Description: Set up the result visualization. If this function sets visualization to true, the SDK will automatically fuse the predicted result with the input data, and the result will be in xref:inferpackresult[Returned Results of Interface Function Inference]. If you have high requirements on performance, please do not set it to true.
超级模型：纸箱超模 link:++https://docs.mech-mind.net//download/Mech-DLK/finetune_models.rar++[点击此处下载] 。
A Super Model example: the Super Model for boxes. link:++https://docs.mech-mind.net//download/Mech-DLK/finetune_models.rar++[Click here] to download.
轻量（推荐 CPU 部署）
运行 SDK C# 示例工程
Run the SDK C# Example Project
通过以下方法可以提升训练、部署的速度和模型的精度。
The following means help improve the speed of training and deployment and the accuracy of the models.
首次加载模型时间略长，需要等待5分钟左右，建议用户使用多线程来调用相应接口。
It takes a little longer (about 5 minutes) to load the model for the first time . It is recommended to use multiple threads to call the corresponding interface.
默认参数设定可以满足大部分需求，如果需要提高模型训练速度或模型精度时，可以通过调整 *训练参数* 重新训练模型以满足需求。

The default parameter settings can meet the requirements of most scenarios. If you need to improve the model training speed or model accuracy, you can adjust the *training parameters* and retrain the model.
默认参数设定可以满足大部分需求，若需要提高推理速度或精度，可以根据实际情况调整 *部署设置* 相关参数。
The default parameter settings can meet the requirements of most scenarios. If you need to improve the inference speed or accuracy, you can adjust the parameters under *deployment settings*.
